Both slaves are here together!\""},{"lineNumber":86873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya!\""},{"lineNumber":86874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランス様、お帰りなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Lord Rance, welcome back.\""},{"lineNumber":86875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふふ、丁度いい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, just right?\""},{"lineNumber":86880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、ご立派です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, very splendid."},{"lineNumber":86881,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぱちぱち」","translatedEnglishLine":"*clap slaves happily clapped together."},{"lineNumber":86885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけでーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, that being said!\""},{"lineNumber":86886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日はシィルとシーラの二人に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today, both Seel and Sheela will"},{"lineNumber":86887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴隷適正検査を受けてもらう」","translatedEnglishLine":"undergo a slave aptitude test.\""},{"lineNumber":86888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":86889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統の奴隷ともなれば、奴隷といえど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even as slaves of the Supreme Commander, slaves nonetheless,"},{"lineNumber":86890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それ相応の資質が求められるってわけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"are required to have appropriate qualities.\""},{"lineNumber":86891,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふふ、能力に満たない方は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, those who do not meet the abilities"},{"lineNumber":86892,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴隷をクビだからな、真剣にやれよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"will be fired as slaves, so take this seriously.\""},{"lineNumber":86893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...!\""},{"lineNumber":86894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それ……その、本気ですか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-that... are you serious...?\""},{"lineNumber":86895,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とーぜん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course."},{"lineNumber":86896,"originalJapaneseLine":"　役立たずは俺の奴隷にはいらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Useless ones have no place as my looked as if the world had ended."},{"lineNumber":86899,"originalJapaneseLine":"（が、頑張らないと……頑張らないと……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I have to do my best... I have to do my best...)"},{"lineNumber":86900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「掃除ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cleaning!\""},{"lineNumber":86901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、終わりましたぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm done...\""},{"lineNumber":86902,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばっかもーーーん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiot!!!"},{"lineNumber":86903,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シィル、シーラにかなり遅れてるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Seel, you're way behind Sheela!\""},{"lineNumber":86904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひーん、すみませぇん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hiiin, I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":86905,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、次だー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, next!\""},{"lineNumber":86906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「洗濯ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Laundry!\""},{"lineNumber":86907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほれほれほれ、シィル！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, come on, come on, Seel!"},{"lineNumber":86908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シーラに仕事がかなり遅れてるぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"You're really behind Sheela on your work!"},{"lineNumber":86909,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと急げ急げ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hurry up, hurry up!\""},{"lineNumber":86910,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすん……す、すみません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sob... I-I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":86911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謝ったって駄目だ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apologizing won't do,"},{"lineNumber":86912,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このドジでのろまな亀！　亀め！","translatedEnglishLine":"you clumsy turtle! Turtle!\""},{"lineNumber":86913,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":86914,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひんひん、頑張りますぅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hiiin, I'll do my best...\""},{"lineNumber":86915,"originalJapaneseLine":"「料理ー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cooking!\""},{"lineNumber":86916,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":86917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これもシーラの方が美味いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela's is also tastier.\""},{"lineNumber":86918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シーラのクッキーおいしーよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sheela's cookies are delicious!\""},{"lineNumber":86919,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、ほんと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, really...\""},{"lineNumber":86920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前らいつの間に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When did you guys...\""},{"lineNumber":86921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お題がお菓子だから来ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We came because the theme was sweets."},{"lineNumber":86922,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うまうま」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yummy yummy.\""},{"lineNumber":86923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、うむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, yes...\""},{"lineNumber":86924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確かにこれもシーラの勝ちだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Certainly, this is also Sheela's win.\""},{"lineNumber":86925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あうっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch...!\""},{"lineNumber":86926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　シィルってそんな","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Isn't Seel that"},{"lineNumber":86927,"originalJapaneseLine":"　家事上手じゃない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"good at housework?\""},{"lineNumber":86928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、シーラさんがすごいんです……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, Sheela-san is amazing..."},{"lineNumber":86929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もうプロ級で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's practically a pro...\""},{"lineNumber":86930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私……先輩風吹かしていたのが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... I was acting like a senior,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっ、奴隷が二人とも揃ってるな！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, I am now the Supreme Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とーっても立派で、とーっても偉い人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A very splendid, very important person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷二人は仲良くぱちぱちした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two slaves happily clapped together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日はシィルとシーラの二人に
奴隷適正検査を受けてもらう」
「総統の奴隷ともなれば、奴隷といえど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even as slaves of the Supreme Commander, slaves nonetheless,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ相応の資質が求められるってわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are required to have appropriate qualities."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふふ、能力に満たない方は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, those who do not meet the abilities

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴隷をクビだからな、真剣にやれよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be fired as slaves, so take this seriously."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 役立たずは俺の奴隷にはいらん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Useless ones have no place as my slaves."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラは世界の終わりのような顔をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela looked as if the world had ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （が、頑張らないと……頑張らないと……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I have to do my best... I have to do my best...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、シーラにかなり遅れてるぞ！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, come on, come on, Seel!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラに仕事がかなり遅れてるぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're really behind Sheela on your work!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このドジでのろまな亀！　亀め！
これもシーラの方が美味いな」
「シーラのクッキーおいしーよー！」
「お題がお菓子だから来ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We came because the theme was sweets.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かにこれもシーラの勝ちだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Certainly, this is also Sheela's win."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　シィルってそんな
「うう、シーラさんがすごいんです……
「私……先輩風吹かしていたのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I... I was acting like a senior,
